text: Brown Eyed Soul is a Korean musical singing group. The 4 men in the band are Naul, Jung-Yeop, Sung-Hun, & Young-Jun. Their genre is soul pop and R&B.; Brown Eyed Soul made their debut in 2003 with their 1st album Soul Free. Their 2nd album, The Wind, The Sea, The Rain was released in 2007. They took four years to release their 2nd album. Although 4 years was a long time, they still had many fans. Their 2nd album sold about 100,000 copies. It helped them win the R&B; award at the 5th Korean Music awards in 2008. Brown Eyed Soul have not appeared on television which is very unusual in Korea where most groups appear regularly. Brown Eyed Soul`s popularity is not their looks or their dancing, but their music. ==Albums== * Soul Free, 2003. 09. 17 * The Wind, The Sea, The Rain, 2007. 11. 02 * Brown Eyed Soul Christmas Concert Live 2007, 2008. 12. 04 * BROWNEYED SOUL, 2010. 11. 25 Category:2000s South Korean music groups Category:2003 establishments in South Korea Category:2010s South Korean music groups Category:2020s South Korean music groups Category:K-pop music groups Category:Musical groups established in 2003 Category:Musical quartets Category:Musical trios Category:South Korean musical groups Category:South Korean R&B; bands
title: Brown Eyed Soul (band)
